name: Notion Resume Templates
description: Welcome to my free Notion resume templates!You may have heard that you may not need a resume anymore. Your LinkedIn is your resume. Your website, your Twitter profile, or even your Instagram could be your new resume. That might get your foot in the door, but eventually, they might ask for your resume. And I am here to make it easier for you. These three carefully designed Notion templates are built to help you share, update, and personalize your resume.Just download the templates and focus on wh
features: Complete access to three (3) Notion layouts and designs; Fully customizable templates with instructions to make content changes; Free to use and download
